components/kapiva/sale-tag: {{#or product.price.non_sale_price_with_tax product.price.non_sale_price_without_tax }} {{#if price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value}} {{round (multiply (divide (subtract price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value price.without_tax.value) price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value)100)}}% OFF {{/if}} {{#if price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value}} {{round (multiply (divide (subtract price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value price.with_tax.value) price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value)100)}}% OFF {{/if}} {{/or}}
